page.title: 10MANOR FARM, WESTON-ON-TRENT.
page.content: MANOR FARM BELONGS TO MR.BIRD AND SON. THEY FARM 3OO ACRES WITH THE HELP OF TWO MEN. THEY ALL WORK A ROTATING FIVE DAY WEEK. MANOR FARM IS MAINLY A SHEEP FARM. THEY HAVE 4OO EWES, 5OO LAMBS AND I5 RAMS AT THE MOMENT. THEY ALSO HAVE I2O BEEF CATTLE. THEIR SHEEP ARE MAINLY PEDIGREE SHROPSHIRE WITH SOME WHITE TEXALS AND BLACK-FACED SUFFOLKS. RECENTLY MR. BIRD TOOK SEVEN SHEEP TO THE ROYAL SHOW WINNING TWO CHAMPION PRIZES AND FIVE COMMENDED. THE FARM HAS THREE TRACTORS, THREE TRAILERS, ONE COMBINE HARVESTER, A CORNDRILL, TWO PLOUGHS, A SET OF DISC HARROWS, TWO ROLLERS, A FERTILIZER SPREADER AND A BALER. MOST OF THE FARMLAND IS GRAZING FOR THE SHEEP WITH A FAIR AMOUNT USED FOR SILEAGE AND HAY (I,OOO BALES HAY AND 9OO SILEAGE BALES PER YEAR).5OACRES WINTER BARLEY AND 35 ACRES OF SPRING BARLEY.
